html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-04552023-05-18HC
ActPest Control Products Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Pest Control Products Regulations (Exclusive Rights and Compensable Data)
PrecisRegulations Amending the PEST CONTROL PRODUCTS REGULATIONS (EXCLUSIVE RIGHTS AND COMPENSABLE DATA) in order to (1) clarify the data protection provisions for re-evaluations and special reviews; (2) clarify what data is subject to compensation; (3) clarify the documentation required when registrants wish to rely on existing data to support their application; (4) clarify that the Minister of Health can make available a single list of test data, instead of lists for each registrant, at the end of the re-evaluation or special review; (5) allow compensation payable for exclusive rights status data; (6) clarify when to initiate negotiations and binding arbitration; and (7) include provisions that provide a clear transition from the current regulations to the amendments when they come into force.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0104 Publication Date: 2023-06-07
AttachmentsAttachment
